live_updates: On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage. Thank you for your patience.

37050.summary: Some customers in the South Granville area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37050.title: May 3 – Vancouver (South Granville) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Our crews have restored services to the area.  Thank you for your patience!
